\newcommand{\ottdrulePrXXappCtx}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{s'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}%
}{
\ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{s'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Pr\_appCtx}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulePrXXDefexpr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{s}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{s'}}%
}{
\ottkw{def} \, \ottkw{x} \, \ottsym{:=}  \ottnt{e}  \longrightarrow  \ottkw{def} \, \ottkw{x} \, \ottsym{:=}  \ottnt{e'}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Pr\_Defexpr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulePrXXDefskip}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottkw{def} \, \ottkw{x} \, \ottsym{:=}  \ottnt{v}  \longrightarrow  \ottkw{skip}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Pr\_Defskip}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnpureXXreduce}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \longrightarrow  \ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}$}{\ottcom{$\ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{1}}}}$ reduces to $\ottnt{s_{{\mathrm{2}}}}$}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulePrXXappCtx{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulePrXXDefexpr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulePrXXDefskip{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}
